alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:35AM PST until January 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Malibu Coast, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area and Eastern San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Fernando Valley; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
